pages.text: 53|45|tatha useene donon prakaar utpann kiye; nar aur naaree.
53|46|veery se, jab (garbhaashay mein) gira.
53|47|tatha usee ke oopar doosaree baar[1] utpann karana hai.
53|48|tatha useene dhanee banaaya aur dhan diya.
53|49|aur vahee sheara[1] ka svaamee hai.
53|50|tatha useene dhvast kiya pratham[1] aad ko.
53|51|tatha samood[1] ko. kisee ko shesh nahin rakha.
53|52|tatha noohî€¼ kee jaati ko isase pahale, vastutah, ve bade atyaachaaree, avagyaakaaree the.
53|53|tatha aundhee kee huee bastee[1] ko usane gira diya.
53|54|phir usapar chha diya, jo chha[1] diya.
53|55|to (he manushy!) too apane paalanahaar ke kin kin puraskaaron mein sandeh karata rahega
53|56|ye[1] sachetakarta hai, pratham sachetakartaon mein se.
53|57|sameep aa lagee sameep aane vaalee.
53|58|nahin hai allaah ke siva use koee door karane vaala.
53|59|to kya tum is[1] quraan par aashchary karate ho
53|60|tatha hansate ho aur rote nahin.
53|61|tatha vimukh ho rahe ho.
53|62|atah, sajda karo allaah ke lie tatha usee kee vandana[1] karo.
54|1|sameep aa gayee[1] pralay tatha do khand ho gaya chaand.
54|2|aur yadi ve dekhate hain koee nishaanee, to munh pher lete hain aur kahate hain: ye to jaadoo hai, jo hota raha hai.
54|3|aur unhonne jhuthalaaya aur anusaran kiya apanee aakaankshaon ka aur pratyek kaary ka ek nishchit samay hai.
54|4|aur nishchay aa chuke hain unake paas kuchh aise samaachaar, jinamen chetaavanee hai.
54|5|ye (quraan) poornatah tatvadarshita (gyaan) hai, phir bhee nahin kaam aayee unake, chetaavaniyaan.
54|6|to aap vimukh ho jaayen unase, jis din pukaarane vaala pukaarega ek apriy cheez kee[1] or.
